attributes.action: Stop SERVING  military personnel from making money from their experiences in action at home or abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems wrong to me that serving men and women can sell their stories for substancial amounts,to the media, when bereaved families very often have to fight for financial support.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
